events.name: Multi-tiered Supply Chain Case Study
events.wd_description: This study provides insights into a multi-tiered supply chain case study focusing on a niche EV manufacturer referred to as EV-Co. It includes an analysis of EV-Co's suppliers for drivetrain-related components.
events.description: This study provides insights into a multi-tiered supply chain case study focusing on a niche EV manufacturer referred to as EV-Co. It includes an analysis of EV-Co's suppliers for drivetrain-related components.

events.name: EV-Co
events.wd_description: EV-Co is a relatively new start-up company planning to increase production from five units to 30,000 units within five years.
events.description: EV-Co is a relatively new start-up company planning to increase production from five units to 30,000 units within five years.

events.name: duction Ramp-up
events.wd_description: EV-Co plans to increase production volume significantly within five years.
events.description: EV-Co plans to increase production volume significantly within five years.

events.name: endency on Suppliers
events.wd_description: EV-Co is highly dependent on its suppliers to achieve quick volume ramp-up and improved operational performance.
events.description: EV-Co is highly dependent on its suppliers to achieve quick volume ramp-up and improved operational performance.

events.name: ource Deficiencies
events.wd_description: EV-Co faces resource deficiencies and risks associated with rapid expansion.
events.description: EV-Co faces resource deficiencies and risks associated with rapid expansion.

events.name: Suppliers
events.wd_description: The identity of EV-Co's suppliers for drivetrain-related components is disguised to preserve their anonymity.
events.description: The identity of EV-Co's suppliers for drivetrain-related components is disguised to preserve their anonymity.

events.name: nymous Suppliers
events.wd_description: The suppliers' identities are kept anonymous for confidentiality.
events.description: The suppliers' identities are kept anonymous for confidentiality.

events.name: vetrain Components Suppliers
events.wd_description: Suppliers provide essential drivetrain-related components that distinguish EVs from ICE vehicles.
events.description: Suppliers provide essential drivetrain-related components that distinguish EVs from ICE vehicles.

events.name: or Suppliers
events.wd_description: Suppliers of motors that are critical for the EV drivetrain.
events.description: Suppliers of motors that are critical for the EV drivetrain.

events.name: tery Suppliers
events.wd_description: Suppliers of batteries that power the EVs.
events.description: Suppliers of batteries that power the EVs.

events.name: l Cells Suppliers
events.wd_description: Suppliers of fuel cells used in EVs.
events.description: Suppliers of fuel cells used in EVs.

events.name: Suppliers
events.wd_description: Suppliers of electronic control units (ECUs) that manage various aspects of the EV drivetrain.
events.description: Suppliers of electronic control units (ECUs) that manage various aspects of the EV drivetrain.

events.name: Drivetrain Components
events.wd_description: Drivetrain-related components are essential for distinguishing EVs from ICE vehicles.
events.description: Drivetrain-related components are essential for distinguishing EVs from ICE vehicles.

events.name: or
events.wd_description: An electric motor is a key component of the EV drivetrain.
events.description: An electric motor is a key component of the EV drivetrain.

events.name: tery
events.wd_description: The battery is a crucial component for powering the EV.
events.description: The battery is a crucial component for powering the EV.

events.name: l Cells
events.wd_description: Fuel cells provide an alternative energy source for the EV drivetrain.
events.description: Fuel cells provide an alternative energy source for the EV drivetrain.

events.name: ctronic Control Units
events.wd_description: ECUs manage various functions of the EV drivetrain.
events.description: ECUs manage various functions of the EV drivetrain.
